channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-14754] TestFastFailWithoutTestUtil failing on trunk now in #testPreemptiveFastFailException50Times
item.description:
I'm just going to remove this suite. Its caused loads of pain over last few months. See HBASE-14484 and HBASE-14421 with all their amendments.

HBASE-14422 was filed a while ago to fix this.
item.summary: TestFastFailWithoutTestUtil failing on trunk now in #testPreemptiveFastFailException50Times

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
History shows it failed once in trunk on 1.8: https://builds.apache.org/view/H-L/view/HBase/job/HBase-Trunk_matrix/428/jdk=latest1.8,label=Hadoop/testReport/junit/org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client/TestFastFailWithoutTestUtil/testPreemptiveFastFailException50Times/history/

Its failed a few times on 1.7 trunk build here: https://builds.apache.org/view/H-L/view/HBase/job/HBase-Trunk_matrix/jdk=latest1.7,label=Hadoop/426/testReport/org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client/TestFastFailWithoutTestUtil/testPreemptiveFastFailException50Times/history/

It just failed on 1.3 build.

Looking over recent history of commits, none interfere with this hbase-common test.
I just git rm'd this test from branch-1.2+ Go to HBASE-14422 if interested in restoring/fixing.

This fail looks same latch issue identified in earlier issues:


Failed



org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TestFastFailWithoutTestUtil.testPreemptiveFastFailException50Times



Failing for the past 4 builds (Since Failed#423 )

Took 38 sec.

add description

org.apache.hadoop.hbase.exceptions.PreemptiveFastFailException: Exception happened 4 times. tolocalhost,1234,987654321
